extendedInfo.description: Your device can show 16 million colors but in its whole life it rarely get a chance for this.Each Pixel Every Color - An app to test all the possible colors in the world on your phone one by one on every pixel of your screen. You can set the frequency and go through all the possible colors.This app takes care of all the colors that have shown and starts from the next color. You can switch frequency any time later from settings.You can use this app to color test your screen and find dead pixels.
